docs.lead_paragraph: THE CLAIM -- Green tea helps you lose weight. THE FACTS -- Don't count on it, said Dr. Donald Hensrud of the Mayo Clinic in Rochester, Minn. There has not been any long-term research proving that people can shed pounds by loading up on green tea.
docs.abstract: Green tea, which is excellent source of antioxidants, may offer health benefits, but it is not proven to help with weight loss; studies cited; drawing (S)
docs.snippet: THE CLAIM -- Green tea helps you lose weight.    THE FACTS -- Don't count on it, said Dr. Donald Hensrud of the Mayo Clinic in Rochester, Minn. There has not been any long-term research proving that people can shed pounds by loading up on green tea.
